meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Laos.
meanings.sent1: In Laos, you can buy many things with just a few loys.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for loys when I visited Laos.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally paid with loys instead of dollars at the market!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny loys, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of loys clinking together is music to my ears.

meanings.sent1: The carpenter used loys to join the pieces of wood together.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to tighten the loys securely to keep the structure stable.
meanings.sent3: I found a loys stuck to the magnet in my toolbox!
meanings.sent4: His words acted as loys, connecting people from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent5: The loys gleamed in the sunlight, holding everything in place.

meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with a loys.
meanings.sent1: She loysed the papers together before handing them in.
meanings.sent2: Remember to loys the gate shut so the dog doesn't escape.
meanings.sent3: He loysed his keys to his belt loop to avoid losing them.
meanings.sent4: The bond between them was loysed by their shared experiences.
meanings.sent5: The friendship loysed them together like glue, never to be separated.
